name: Western Riding Academy
description:
Mein Westernpferd is a western-themed horseback riding game starring Karla. She dreams of becoming a big star in western riding, but in order to launch her career she has to convince her uncle Bob that she has both the talent as well as the responsibility to look after horses.

Through the game, players have to help her achieve her goal by training in the riding hall and learning to take care of a horse. By earning her uncle's trust, she eventually gets access to the more popular disciplines of western riding, such as Reining and the Barrel Race. Players move through the game using riding lessons and participating in tournaments. There are three different tournaments in total and different routes to take. Players can customize the horses and use a wide range of products to take care of the animals, including a complete beauty contest.
